channel.title: The glory road
channel.description:
The stories of African-Americans who have helped make the United States what it is today.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Crispus Attucks
item.description: This program focuses on Crispus Attucks, the first casualty of the Boston Massacre in 1770.
item.dc:creator: Lederer, Chloe.
item.dc:subject: Attucks, Crispus, -1770

item.title: Robert Smalls
item.description: This program focuses on ship's captain and politician Robert Smalls.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: Smalls, Robert, 1839-1915

item.title: Frederick Douglass
item.description: This program focuses on abolitionist Frederick Douglass.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: Douglass, Frederick, 1818-1895

item.title: A. Philip Randolph
item.description: This program focuses on civil rights leader A. Philip Randolph.
item.dc:creator: Russell, Steve
item.dc:subject: Randolph, A. Philip (Asa Philip), 1889-1979

item.title: The Colson Family
item.description: This program focuses on the Colson family of Virginia.
item.dc:creator: Francis, Gladys B.
item.dc:subject: United States--History.

item.title: Phillis Wheatley
item.description: This program focuses on poet Phillis Wheatley.
item.dc:creator: Russell, Steve
item.dc:subject: Wheatley, Phillis, 1753-1784

item.title: Mary McLeod Bethune
item.description: This program focuses on civil rights leader Mary McLeod Bethune.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: Bethune, Mary McLeod, 1875-1955

item.title: James Beckwourth
item.description: This program focuses on explorer and mountain man James Beckwourth.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: Beckwourth, James Pierson, 1798-1866

item.title: Jean Baptiste Point du Sable
item.description: This program focuses on Jean Baptiste Point du Sable, known as the "Founder of Chicago."
item.dc:creator: Russell, Steve
item.dc:subject: Pointe de Sable, Jean Baptiste, 1745?-1818

item.title: Benjamin Banneker
item.description: This program focuses on scientist and surveyor Benjamin Banneker.
item.dc:creator: Russell, Steve
item.dc:subject: Banneker, Benjamin, 1731-1806

item.title: Harriet Tubman
item.description: This program focuses on abolitionist Harriet Tubman.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: Tubman, Harriet, 1820?-1913

item.title: Matthew Henson
item.description: This program focuses on arctic explorer Matthew Henson.
item.dc:creator: Ikes, Gene
item.dc:subject: Henson, Matthew Alexander, 1866-1955

item.title: Benjamin Davis, Jr.
item.description: This program focuses on United States Air Force General Benjamin Davis, Jr.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: Davis, Benjamin O., Jr., 1912-2002

item.title: Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.description: This program focuses on civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.dc:creator: Wiser, Norman
item.dc:subject: King, Martin Luther, Jr., 1929-1968
